Feb. Mar. Apr. May June July Aug. Oct. Nov. Dec. 1944 Jan. Feb. Mar. Apr. May June July Aug. Oct. Nov. Dec. 1945 Jan. Feb. Mar. Sources: RZA, Blatt 92, January 1943-January 1945; RVK, “Wagenstellung fiir Kohlen nach Revieren,” BA RIO VIII/16, ff. 629, 631. a. From November 1943 the Saar and Lorraine regions were combined by the Reichsbahn for the purpose of counting coal cars. The figures for the preceding months have been altered to facilitate comparison by adding together the figures for the two regions. Sept. Sept.
